column5: Casa Ella is a spacious 1,400 sq ft home on a quiet street that can accommodate up to eight people. You will be only a 6-minute drive to the RiverWalk. Easy access to Interstate 10 and a straight shot to Six Flags. Our place is good for couples, families, attending conventions, SeaWorld, Fiesta Texas, Spurs Games. Graduations at Randolph AFB, Ft Sam, and Lackland or exploring our beautiful city and Riverwalk.
column8: Quiet, Spacious 6 minute drive to Riverwalk Alamo!
